helpModal.title: Help
helpModal.imgAlt: Visual description of the form variables and their implications on the guidelines
helpModal.0: The correspondence between the form and the lines generated is the following:
helpModal.3: The baseline has a zero on the distance because it is the reference
helpModal.4: You can save your guides as PDF selecting your system's PDF printer on the print dialogue window

warning.instagram: Printing may not work if you came from Instagram. If you have issues, please open this page in your native browser using the three dots menu.

help.measures: All measures are expressed in milimeters
help.deactivate: If you want to deactivate a line, set it's line width to 0
